product_name: The North Face Tadasana VPR Capri Pants - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Flattering, supportive yoga capris that you'll love to wear on the mat when tackling tough poses, The North Face Tadasana VPR Capri Pants for women balance comfort and performance. Slimming, partially recycled ShapeShifter fabric and wrapped seam construction elongate the silhouette. Wide, ruched waistband won't dig in as you bend and stretch. Small key pocket; quick-drying. Closeout.
short_description: Flattering, supportive yoga capris that you'll love to wear on the mat when tackling tough poses, The North Face Tadasana VPR Capri Pants for women balance comfort and performance.
